overview: Hey there! This is Abrahem Benson and I love sketch comedies. I would probably be learning how to perform sketch comedies in front of a live audience but I have a huge problem with crowds. So instead of performing, I try to write funny bits in my spare time and share it online. When I’m not thinking of short, funny scenarios, I keep busy by installing Liftmaster Garage Door Opener right around where I live in the star-studded Calabasas, California.
